trans-unit.source: An AtExit hook is a function that is invoked after the Node.js event loop has ended but before the JavaScript VM is terminated and Node.js shuts down. AtExit hooks are registered using the node::AtExit API.
trans-unit.target: AtExit 후크는 자바 스크립트 VM을 종료하고 Node.js를 닫힌다 다운되기 전에 Node.js를 이벤트 루프가 종료 된 후 호출되지만 기능입니다. AtExit 후크는 node::AtExit 사용하여 등록됩니다. API를 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous resource represents an object with an associated callback. This callback may be called multiple times, for example, the 'connection' event in net.createServer(), or just a single time like in fs.open(). A resource can also be closed before the callback is called. AsyncHook does not explicitly distinguish between these different cases but will represent them as the abstract concept that is a resource.
trans-unit.target: 비동기 리소스는 관련 콜백이있는 객체를 나타냅니다. 이 콜백은 여러 번 호출 될 수 있습니다 (예 : net.createServer() 의 'connection' 이벤트 또는 fs.open() 과 같은 단일 시간 ) . 콜백을 호출하기 전에 리소스를 닫을 수도 있습니다. AsyncHook 은 이러한 서로 다른 경우를 명시 적으로 구분하지는 않지만이를 리소스 인 추상 개념으로 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: An attempt has been made to create a Buffer larger than the maximum allowed size.

trans-unit.source: An attempt has been made to create a string longer than the maximum allowed length.

trans-unit.source: An attempt to require the above es-module-package would attempt to load ./node_modules/es-module-package/src/index.js as CommonJS, which would throw an error as Node.js would not be able to parse the export statement in CommonJS.
trans-unit.target: 위의 es-module-package 를 require 하면 ./node_modules/es-module-package/src/index.js 를 CommonJS 로로드하려고 시도합니다. Node.js가 export 를 구문 분석 할 수 없으므로 오류가 발생합니다. CommonJS의 진술.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to require() an ES Module.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to call stream.write() after stream.end() has been called.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to call stream.write() with a null chunk.
trans-unit.target: null 청크 와 함께 stream.write() 를 호출하려고했습니다 .

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to close the process.stderr stream. By design, Node.js does not allow stdout or stderr streams to be closed by user code.
trans-unit.target: process.stderr 스트림 을 닫으려고했습니다 . 설계 상 Node.js는 stdout 또는 stderr 스트림을 사용자 코드로 닫을 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to initiate a new push stream from within a push stream. Nested push streams are not permitted.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to initiate operations on a watcher returned by fs.watch() that has not yet been started.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to issue Server Name Indication from a TLS server-side socket, which is only valid from a client.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to launch a Node.js process with an unknown stdin file type. This error is usually an indication of a bug within Node.js itself, although it is possible for user code to trigger it.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to launch a Node.js process with an unknown stdout or stderr file type. This error is usually an indication of a bug within Node.js itself, although it is possible for user code to trigger it.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to load a module with an unknown or unsupported file extension.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to load a module with an unknown or unsupported format.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to load a policy manifest, but the manifest had multiple entries for a resource which did not match each other. Update the manifest entries to match in order to resolve this error. See the documentation for policy manifests for more information.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to load a policy manifest, but the manifest was unable to be parsed. See the documentation for policy manifests for more information.
trans-unit.target: 정책 매니페스트를로드하려고했지만 매니페스트를 파싱 할 수 없습니다. 자세한 내용은 정책 목록에 대한 설명서를 참조하십시오 .

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to load a resource, but the resource did not match the integrity defined by the policy manifest. See the documentation for policy manifests for more information.
trans-unit.target: 리소스를로드하려고했지만 리소스가 정책 매니페스트에 의해 정의 된 무결성과 일치하지 않았습니다. 자세한 내용은 정책 목록에 대한 설명서를 참조하십시오 .

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to load a resource, but the resource was not listed as a dependency from the location that attempted to load it. See the documentation for policy manifests for more information.
trans-unit.target: 리소스를로드하려고했지만 리소스를로드하려는 위치의 종속성으로 리소스가 나열되지 않았습니다. 자세한 내용은 정책 목록에 대한 설명서를 참조하십시오 .

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to open an IPC communication channel with a synchronously forked Node.js process. See the documentation for the child_process module for more information.
trans-unit.target: 동 기적으로 분기 된 Node.js 프로세스로 IPC 통신 채널을 열려고했습니다. 자세한 내용은 child_process 모듈 설명서를 참조하십시오 .

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to operate on an already closed socket.
trans-unit.target: 이미 닫힌 소켓에서 작동하려고했습니다.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to read an encrypted key without specifying a passphrase.
trans-unit.target: 암호를 지정하지 않고 암호화 된 키를 읽으려고했습니다.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to read from a policy manifest, but the manifest initialization has not yet taken place. This is likely a bug in Node.js.
trans-unit.target: 정책 매니페스트에서 읽으려고했지만 매니페스트 초기화가 아직 수행되지 않았습니다. Node.js의 버그 일 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to register something that is not a function as an AsyncHooks callback.
trans-unit.target: 함수가 아닌 것을 AsyncHooks 콜백 으로 등록하려고했습니다 .

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to renegotiate TLS on a socket instance with TLS disabled.
trans-unit.target: TLS가 사용 불가능한 소켓 인스턴스에서 TLS를 재협상하려고했습니다.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to send an unsupported "handle" over an IPC communication channel to a child process. See subprocess.send() and process.send() for more information.
trans-unit.target: IPC 통신 채널을 통해 지원되지 않는 "핸들"을 하위 프로세스로 보내려고했습니다. 자세한 내용은 subprocess.send() 및 process.send() 를 참조하십시오.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to send multiple response headers.
trans-unit.target: 여러 응답 헤더를 보내려고했습니다.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to start a watcher returned by fs.watch() that has already been started.
trans-unit.target: 이미 시작된 fs.watch() 의해 리턴 된 감시자를 시작하려고 했습니다.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to use a URL of an incompatible scheme (protocol) for a specific purpose. It is only used in the WHATWG URL API support in the fs module (which only accepts URLs with 'file' scheme), but may be used in other Node.js APIs as well in the future.
trans-unit.target: 특정 목적을 위해 호환되지 않는 체계 (프로토콜)의 URL을 사용하려고했습니다. fs 모듈 의 WHATWG URL API 지원 ( 'file' 체계의 URL 만 허용)에서만 사용되지만 향후 다른 Node.js API에서도 사용될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to use an IPC communication channel that was already closed.
trans-unit.target: 이미 닫힌 IPC 통신 채널을 사용하려고했습니다.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to use crypto features while Node.js was not compiled with OpenSSL crypto support.
trans-unit.target: Node.js가 OpenSSL 암호화 지원으로 컴파일되지 않은 상태에서 암호화 기능을 사용하려고했습니다.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to use features that require ICU, but Node.js was not compiled with ICU support.
trans-unit.target: ICU 가 필요한 기능을 사용하려고 했지만 Node.js가 ICU 지원으로 컴파일되지 않았습니다.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to use the Http2Stream.prototype.responseWithFile() API to send a directory.
trans-unit.target: 시도는 사용하려고했습니다 Http2Stream.prototype.responseWithFile() 디렉토리를 보내 API를.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to use the Http2Stream.prototype.responseWithFile() API to send something other than a regular file, but offset or length options were provided.
trans-unit.target: Http2Stream.prototype.responseWithFile() API 를 사용하여 일반 파일 이외의 것을 보내 려고 시도 했지만 offset 또는 length 옵션이 제공되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to use the socket property of an Http2Session that has already been closed.
trans-unit.target: 이미 닫힌 Http2Session 의 socket 속성 을 사용하려고했습니다 .

trans-unit.source: An easier method of constructing the mode is to use a sequence of three octal digits (e.g. 765). The left-most digit (7 in the example), specifies the permissions for the file owner. The middle digit (6 in the example), specifies permissions for the group. The right-most digit (5 in the example), specifies the permissions for others.
trans-unit.target: mode 를 구성하는 더 쉬운 방법은 3 개의 8 진수 (예 : 765 ) 의 시퀀스를 사용하는 것 입니다. 가장 왼쪽 자리 ( 예에서 7 )는 파일 소유자에 대한 권한을 지정합니다. 가운데 숫자 ( 예에서 6 )는 그룹에 대한 권한을 지정합니다. 가장 오른쪽 숫자 ( 예에서 5 )는 다른 사람의 권한을 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: An element in the iterable provided to the WHATWGURLSearchParams constructor did not represent a [name, value] tuple – that is, if an element is not iterable, or does not consist of exactly two elements.
trans-unit.target: WHATWG URLSearchParams 생성자에 제공된 iterable 의 요소 는 [name, value] 튜플을 나타내지 않습니다. 즉, 요소가 iterable이 아니거나 정확히 두 개의 요소로 구성되지 않은 경우입니다.

trans-unit.source: An element in the iterable provided to the WHATWGURLSearchParams constructor did not represent a [name, value] tuple – that is, if an element is not iterable, or does not consist of exactly two elements.
trans-unit.target: 의 소자 iterable 받는 제공 WHATWG URLSearchParams 의 생성자 나타내지 않았다 [name, value] 요소는 반복 가능하지 않거나 정확히 두 개의 요소로 구성되지 않는 경우, 인 - 튜플.

trans-unit.source: An error is thrown when an attempt is made to copy the Hash object after its hash.digest() method has been called.
trans-unit.target: hash.digest() 메서드가 호출 된 후 Hash 객체 를 복사하려고하면 오류가 발생 합니다 .

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while attempting to retrieve the JavaScript undefined value.
trans-unit.target: JavaScript undefined 값 을 검색하는 중 오류가 발생했습니다 .

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while invoking the JavaScript portion of the thread-safe function.
trans-unit.target: 스레드 안전 함수의 JavaScript 부분을 호출하는 중에 오류가 발생했습니다.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while issuing a command via the inspector module.
trans-unit.target: inspector 모듈을 통해 명령을 발행하는 중에 오류가 발생했습니다 .

trans-unit.source: An error returned by stream.finished() and stream.pipeline(), when a stream or a pipeline ends non gracefully with no explicit error.
trans-unit.target: 스트림 또는 파이프 라인이 명시적인 오류없이 정상적으로 종료되지 않은 경우 stream.finished() 및 stream.pipeline() 에서 반환 된 오류입니다.

trans-unit.source: An error thrown by one handler function does not prevent the other handlers from being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 하나의 핸들러 함수에서 발생한 오류는 다른 핸들러가 호출되는 것을 방해하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: An error will be thrown if an invalid address is provided.
trans-unit.target: 유효하지 않은 주소가 제공되면 오류가 발생합니다.
